name: JS1K 2012
description:
Important: You must click the game first to give it focus.

Collect the hearts to grow your love! Try to fill the board, without crashing into yourself.

[W,A,S,D] to move.

This game was created as part of a JavaScript competition (JS1K) themed around Love. The objective of the competition is to create a themed game/animation in only 1 kilobyte of JavaScript (it's harder than it sounds).

You can view the original entry or you can hit me up if you want to chat about it.
